sections.heading: situated in more than one county; jails
sections.text: Any village situated in two or more counties may use the jails of any and all counties in which any part of such village is situated.SourceLaws 1893, c. 9, § 4, p. 139;R.S.1913, § 5072;C.S.1922, § 4244;C.S.1929, § 17-222;R.S.1943, § 17-222;Laws 2017, LB133, §
